original_text: The Lord made me walk up and down among the bones. I could see many bones there, on the ground in the valley. They were completely dry.
korean_text: 나를 그 뼈 사방으로 지나가게 하시기로 본즉 그 골짜기 지면에 뼈가 심히 많고 아주 말랐더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord made me walk up and down
I could see many bones there
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그곳에 많은 뼈들을 볼 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: on the ground in the valley
